button.name: reset_dialogs_btn
button.label: Enable all popups
button.tool_tip: Enable all of the optional popups and 'first time use' notifications.

button.name: skip_dialogs_btn
button.label: Disable all popups
button.tool_tip: Disable all of the optional popups and 'first time use' notifications.

check_box.name: show_in_inventory
check_box.label: Automatically show newly accepted objects in inventory

text.name: text_box2
text.tool_tip: These settings are for inventory items offered to you and which got a preview floater available (notecards, textures, sounds, animations, landmarks). This excludes objects, wearable items, gestures, environment settings, etc, which must be rezzed/attached, worn or activated to be viewed. Scripts (which are most of the time closed sources/not viewable) and calling cards (which may be recreated en masse or offered when forming friendship) are also excluded.

panel.text: Offers of inventory items with preview support:

check_box.name: accept_new_inventory
check_box.label: Automatically reject when busy
check_box.tool_tip: When this option is checked, any inventory offer sent to you while you are set Busy will be automatically rejected. Please note that this is a dangerous option, since the sender might not be properly notified their offer was rejected and lead them to believe it was accepted when it actually was rejected...

check_box.name: notify_money_change
check_box.label: Notify when virtual money (L$) is spent or received
check_box.tool_tip: When this option is checked, a blue dialog shows each time you spend or receive money.

check_box.name: hide_notifications_in_chat
check_box.label: Do not echo/log notify tips in chat
check_box.tool_tip: The notify tips are those blue notifications appearing for a few seconds at the bottom right of the viewer window. They don't carry critical information

check_box.name: script_errors_as_chat
check_box.label: Show script errors and warnings in chat
check_box.tool_tip: Script errors are logged into the Script/Warning floater (Tool -> Show Script Warning/Error Window) but may also be logged in chat via this setting

check_box.name: teleport_history_in_chat
check_box.label: Notify & log the TP departure locations in the chat history
check_box.tool_tip: There is a persistent teleport history (View -> Teleport history). However, this history might get cleared, and it keeps the departure locations only as an option (see the Cool features tab, Miscellaneous options). You may therefore still want to keep a log of your teleport departure locations in the chat history

spinner.name: private_look_notify_delay
spinner.label: Look at notification delay (0 to disable)
spinner.tool_tip: This is the length of time (in seconds) after which you would be notified that a resident's camera is being focused onto your own avatar. Note that, for reprocity reasons, this notification will only occur if you are not using the 'Do not look at objects...' feature (in the 'Input & camera' preferences tab, 'Input controls' sub-tab) or if the looker's avatar distance is within the maximum broadcast distance set for this feature.
